sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const RandomPokemon = () => { const pokemonData = { image: null, name: null, id: null, xp: null, height: null, weight: null, dataState: false } const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 150) const url = `https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/${randomNumber}` fetch(url) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) pokemonData.image = (data.sprites.other["official-artwork"].front_default) pokemonData.name(data.name) pokemonData.id(data.id) pokemonData.xp(data.base_experience) pokemonData.height(data.height) pokemonData.weight(data.weight) pokemonData.dataState(true) }) return (
{ pokemonData.dataState &&
Name: {name} ID: {id} XP: {xp} Height: {height} Weight: {weight}
}
) } export default RandomPokemon
